params.ipId: The address of the IP asset.
The address of the IP asset.

setAll(address,string,bytes32,bytes32).details: Will revert if IP asset's metadata is frozen.

params.ipId: The address of the IP asset.
params.metadataHash: The hash of metadata at metadataURI. Use bytes32(0) to indicate that the metadata is not available.
params.metadataURI: The metadataURI to set for the IP asset.
params.nftMetadataHash: A bytes32 hash representing the metadata of the NFT. This metadata is associated with the IP Asset and is accessible via the NFT's TokenURI. Use bytes32(0) to indicate that the metadata is not available.

setMetadataURI(address,string,bytes32).details: Will revert if IP asset's metadata is frozen.

params.ipId: The address of the IP asset.
params.metadataHash: The hash of metadata at metadataURI. Use bytes32(0) to indicate that the metadata is not available.
params.metadataURI: The metadataURI to set for the IP asset.

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[ERC section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.

updateNftTokenURI(address,bytes32).details: Will revert if IP asset's metadata is frozen.

params.ipId: The address of the IP asset.
params.nftMetadataHash: A bytes32 hash representing the metadata of the NFT. This metadata is associated with the IP Asset and is accessible via the NFT's TokenURI. Use bytes32(0) to indicate that the metadata is not available.

freezeMetadata(address).notice: make all metadata of the IP Asset immutable.

isMetadataFrozen(address).notice: Check if the metadata of the IP Asset is immutable.

name().notice: Returns the string identifier associated with the module.

setAll(address,string,bytes32,bytes32).notice: Sets all core metadata for an IP asset.

setMetadataURI(address,string,bytes32).notice: Sets the metadataURI for an IP asset.

updateNftTokenURI(address,bytes32).notice: Update the nftTokenURI for an IP asset, by retrieve the latest TokenURI from IP NFT to which the IP Asset bound.
